sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This is Euronews Now. I'm Helena Humphrey. Here are your headlines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More help for Ukraine. The U.S. announces another billion-dollar aid and military package, their biggest delivery of weaponry yet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Pressure builds on Greece's prime minister as Mitsotakis says he was not aware of a phone-hacking operation on opposition parties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And Donald Trump says FBI agents have raided his Mar-a-Lago home in Florida.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: His lawyer says some papers were seized.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Pentagon has announced one billion dollars worth of fresh military aid for Ukraine,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: including additional HIMA rocket systems that have helped Kyiv's forces attack Russian troops far behind the front lines. It's Washington's biggest tranche of aid so far, bringing the total amount to $9.8 billion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We are working around the clock to fulfill Ukraine's priority security assistance requests, delivering weapons from the United States stocks when they are available, and facilitating the delivery of weapons by allies and partners when their systems better suit Ukraine's needs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In Ukraine, the shelling goes on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: One of the latest strikes by Russian missiles hit the Donetsk town of Kramatorsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We were sleeping. At 2.15 there was an incoming missile. The windows shattered and that's it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We went out into the street and we saw a big hole in the garden. There was a garden here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It was possible to collect everything, to do conservation, but there is nothing left.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Planning ahead, the UN has revised its humanitarian appeal for Ukraine before winter arrives, increasing it from 2.25 to 4.3 billion dollars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Our humanitarian colleagues warn that during the forthcoming winter, the situation can deteriorate as more people will be displaced from areas with limited access to gas, fuel or electricity. Supporting them is a priority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russian state television has released footage showing the aftermath of Ukrainian shelling in Donetsk. Separatist authorities claim two locals were killed and five more were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The 27 members of the European Union are in the starting blocks in a race to cut their natural gas use by 15 percent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: They have until March 31st next year to do so.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It's all part of a plan agreed two weeks ago to ready the bloc for a possible halt in Russian supplies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen warned last week that Europe must prepare for the worst situation with regard to Russia and its control of its gas production.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: According to the European Commission, a total of 45 billion cubic metres of gas must be saved to reach the target over the next seven months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Germany alone would have to consume around 10 billion cubic metres less.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Germany accounts for about 40% of the Russian gas imported by the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Some countries that depend heavily on Russian gas imports, such as Hungary, have demanded exemptions from the new gas saving measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Moscow has significantly reduced gas supplies to the block, in what Brussels sees as a retaliatory measure against EU sanctions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It's a scandal that has rocked Greece.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Last week, the head of the socialist PASOK opposition party, Nikos Androulakis, reported to the country's Supreme Court that there had been an attempt to bug his cell phone with the predator's spyware.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis maintained his line that he was unaware of the phone tapping.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In a speech to the nation, he reinstated that his hands are clean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The National Intelligence Service underrated the political dimension of this particular action. The surveillance may have abided with the letter of the law, but it was wrong.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: I had no knowledge of this, and if I did, I would never have allowed it." The head of Greece's intelligence service has since resigned, with Mitsotakis calling for a complete overhaul and review of the department.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: An elected MEP between 2014-19, Andrew Lakis said on Friday he had learned intelligence services listened to his conversations in late 2021, but he did not disclose his sources.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Greek Prime Minister, Kyriakos Mitsotakis, και που μπορεί να καταλήξει την εμβολία. intelligence service that reports directly to the Prime Minister's office. The revelations led to the resignation of its intelligence chief but also his

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: own top aide and nephew. In a televised address the Prime Minister described the surveillance of PASOK leader as a mistake although legal that he had no idea about. At the same time he green-lighted parliamentary committee check and announced four areas of reform in the intelligence service. The scandal first broke when Nikos Androulakis, who is also an MEP, publicly said that he had been informed by the European Parliament of an attempt to bug his mobile phone with predator malware. In a twist of the case there are two different apps of Androulakis' phone. In addition to the attempt with predator malware. In a twist of the case, there are two different taps of Andrulaki's phone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In addition to the attempt with predator, he was also legally tapped by Greek intelligence agents after requests from Armenian and Ukrainian authorities, according to government sources.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Both countries, however, rejected any involvement in the Greek scandal, which puts the government in its biggest crisis since assuming power in July 2018 last but not least Mitsotakis didn't say a word about a Greek journalist covering finance who has also taken legal action following allegations of similar illegal surveillance by a government heavily criticized abroad for restricting media freedom. Efe Koutsokosta, Euronews, Athens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Following the dramatic collapse of Italy's coalition government under Mario Draghi,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: preparations are underway for a snap general election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And in what could be worrying news for Brussels, right-wing anti-establishment parties such as the Five Star Movement are topping the polls.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: With the countdown underway, Euronews correspondent Georgia Orlandi Right-wing anti-establishment parties such as the Five Star Movement are topping the polls.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: With the countdown underway, Euronews correspondent Giorgia Orlandi brings us the latest political horse trading in Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: With only a few weeks before Italy's next general elections, political parties are getting ready.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In particular, they are in the process of forming alliances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In fact, Italy's election law favours those parties that form big alliances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Only a few days ago, a centre-left coalition broke down, just less than a week after coming together, potentially handing the victory to another coalition that includes two far-right parties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: That coalition is led by Giorgio Meloni's Brothers of Italy and includes Mattos Albini's far-right League Party and Silvio Berlusconi's Forza Italia and that coalition is poised to get a clear majority on the 25th of September. Now given that under the current law the leader of the party within a specific coalition that gets the largest share of the vote is entitled to become Prime Minister, Giorgia Meloni could become Italy's next prime minister and Italy's first female prime minister. But brothers of Italy's stance on a number of issues including relations with Russia with Europe and the way the party intends to reform Italy's resilience and recovery plan the plan that former Prime Minister Mario Draghi put forward in order for the country to get the largest share of the EU recovery funds, funds that are necessary to help the economy grow following the effects of the pandemic, has drawn a lot of criticism, especially in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Giorgio Orlandi for Euronews in Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: especially in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Giorgio Orlandi for Euronews in Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Former US President Donald Trump says the country's justice system was being weaponized against him following a Monday morning raid on his Florida residence by the FBI.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Although yet to comment, reports suggest federal officers are investigating the removal of classified documents from the White House.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Trump who was in New York at the time called the move unnecessary and accused the Department of Justice of prosecutional misconduct.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The former president who is considering to run again in 2024, said the raid was part of a ploy by his rivals, the Democratic Party, ahead of upcoming November elections.
